talking will distract learners from the visual demonstration.
✱  Watch for their response and action and adjusting one’s pace accordingly.
✱  Inspire confidence in learners as they proceed.  This way they will be willing 
and keen.
✱  Try not to over impress or be too absorbed in the demonstration.  
✱  On finishing the demonstration, check that the process has been fully understood.  Ask the participants to recap the main points of the activity.  
This will help to identify gaps in knowledge and reinforce learning.
Participant practice and supervision
Participants need to practice new skills in order to achieve a positive and benefit 
result.  In providing participants with opportunities for individual practice, it is 
important to:
✱  Plan specific times during the session when individual practice is to be undertaken.
